pages.text: This beverage, brewed from [#](bb00bb)Chorus Fruit[#](), takes over - and amplifies - not only the special taste, but also the unique property of the plant.\\When ingested, this drink randomly teleports you over great distances. The higher the alcohol content, the further.

pages.title: Titration Recipe
pages.text: _Tastes like raspberry, but there are none in it at all. Strange._
